Articles.Content:
Think of any slogan related to KSP that you would love to see on a bumper sticker or T-shirt.

"I learned higher math's (ksp logo) from a video game"

Would love to see one or more of these become a reality. I would promote it.
"My other vehicle is the Kerbal X."
"This is not a docking port."

"Bob is my Co-Pilot"

(not my idea, seen it somewhere)

"Prograde" on front

"Retrograde" on back
^ This is good. I support this.
+1 for imaspacestation!

These are all really awesome.

Alshain - That's very clever I would put it on my car.

Plume & Akakak - That's funny, its almost dirty, which makes it even more funny

Laie - I could see that on a car with a picture of a rocket, very nice.

imaspacestation - Perfect T-shirt, its elegant. reminds me of something you would see on Thinkgeek.com

Bumber Sticker:

"How is efficient is my driving? Call 555 - MANLEY"

imaspacestaion's Tshirt is unbeatable :-) would buy
Heng - Great homage to Scott Manley. He would love that one.

> 
> "Prograde" on front
> "Retrograde" on back

Love it.

A more obscure one would be just the markers. Sort of an internal joke. If you ever see a guy (or a girl) on a street wearing that shirt, you can drop just a simple comment and instantly you're best buddies.

My Other Car

NEEDS MORE BOOSTERS!

![oVOZIvY.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/oVOZIvY.jpg)

![UxOqxYF.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/UxOqxYF.jpg)

There you go imaspacestation.

> 
> [pro-/retrograde]
> Love it.
> 
> A more obscure one would be just the markers.

Of course! I'd take a whole stack to last me a lifetime. The prograde marker may well sit right on my pot belly.

> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/oVOZIvY.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/oVOZIvY.jpg)
> [http://i.imgur.com/UxOqxYF.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/UxOqxYF.jpg)
> 
> There you go imaspacestation.

Where can I order? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I just made it in 5 minutes in custom ink.

Someone had a T-shirt with just this image, which I thought was awesome:

![100px-Anti-normal.svg.png](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/thumb/1/19/Anti-normal.svg/100px-Anti-normal.svg.png)
I would pay real money for some of those.

Eve or bust

Real men/women do it with little green men/women

- - - Updated - - -

Bill is my co-pilot

How about an overused "Keep calm..." type of shirt?

"Keep intact and go exploring"

or

"Keep intact and carry on exploring" <-- this one prob sounds better

And there could be a rocket launching from a cloud of smoke loosely resembling the crown.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-11T23:07:25Z" title="06/11/2015 11:07  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 11, 2015</time> by Veeltch**

> 
> How about an overused "Keep calm..." type of shirt?
> "Keep intact and go exploring"
> 
> or
> 
> "Keep intact and carry on exploring" <-- this one prob sounds better
> 
> And there could be a rocket launching from a cloud of smoke loosely resembling the crown.

Keep calm and keep Kerbin?
Keep calm and add boosters/struts.
Keep calm and hit spacebar.

> 
> How about an overused "Keep calm..." type of shirt?
> "Keep intact and go exploring"
> 
> or
> 
> "Keep intact and carry on exploring" <-- this one prob sounds better
> 
> And there could be a rocket launching from a cloud of smoke loosely resembling the crown.

Keep calm and hit the abort button.
My other vehicle's fuel efficiency is measured in specific impulse.
